C_Cpp.clang_format_fallbackStyle: {BasedOnStyle: LLVM, AccessModifierOffset: -4, FixNamespaceComments: false, NamespaceIndentation: All, IndentWidth: 4, TabWidth: 4, UseTab: Always, ColumnLimit: 160, AlignTrailingComments: false, AlignAfterOpenBracket: BlockIndent, AllowShortFunctionsOnASingleLine: Empty}
